From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>

BrightBlade, Rage


* BrightBlade laughed and jumped over Tavatron's staff, it was just like a 
game she used to play as a child...jump-rope!
She then landed on top of the boulder with both feet and fired at Tavatron, 
the supercharged charge heading straight for the Maximal's head.
She laughed again...*

" Are all Maximals as pathetic as you are? Really, trying to defeat one of 
the Mighty Hell Beast's troops, have sense women."

* BrightBlade laughed at Tavatron again, this time having a tone of 
superiority in it. She aimed this time at Tavatron's stomach and let two 
charges go, she wouldn't be alive today if she would have ever let a Maximal 
win over her!*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

*Rage stormed into the battle and sighted her target, it wasn't the biggest 
thing that she had ever hunted down but she was so hungry now that she 
didn't care!
She swiftly covered the distance between her and it, she roared and swung 
her jaws in for the kill!(Liono.)
Rage listened to her stomach as her jaws started to close in around her 
target's waist, it told her that after she was finished with this meal she 
should go after another!*
